subject: Possible order
description_text:
Dear sirs,
I am thinking about buying a new pedal set. I read many positive reviews
about your products.
I am not sure if it will be Plus X or Pro X. Probably with Vam pro

I have two questions.
Can you tell me if the next sim racing games are compatible with your
pedals. F1 24, F1 25, Automobilista 2, Assetto corsa EVO, LM Ultimate and
EA Sports WRC.
And second, do you ship from Europe because of tax and custom regulations?

Regards, Davor Fabijanic

conversations.body_text: Hi Davor Fabijanic,      Our pedals are compatible with these games. For EU orders, we ship from our German warehouse, so there's no need to worry about customs duties.

Hello,
thank you for the really fast response.
I received an offer from you with a 10% discount. Well it is nice, but I
have to ask you, are you planning a Black Friday sale?

In case I order pedals with VAM pro is it possible to ask for Haptic
Reactor Mounting Brackets for clutch instead of bracket for brake and
throttle?

Regards, Davor

On Fri, Oct 31, 2025 at 2:30 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Davor Fabijanic,  Yes, you can use this $45 Black Friday discount coupon with the promo code Black45.   Additionally, you can request a replacement mounting bracket in the order notes.
